column5: Well we went out this morning looking for some panfish. Using Gulp and small crankbaits i cought several perch but to end off the day i cought my first Carp on a worm and a heavy sinker on the bottom. The fight was unreal.
Nice Job!  Congrats on your first carp!
Holy carp that's a big crap!  er....you know what I mean
Jeeze there's always a joke about something here lol.
Congrats on your first. Prepare to be addicted.
Nice job Mike, congrats on the first carp.

Nice way to get started . . .  .    .        but just wait till you get a B I I I  I   G one . . . .    that one, compared to a 30+ pounder, is just a baby. Over 20 pounds . . .   like hookin' onto a G O train!
cool  WTG
Congrats Mike...very nice.
Nice fish, thanks for sharing.
WTG brother... look out.. u might get hooked on carp, and the scrap they can put up, too.
congratulation on your first carp.for sure it does give good fight
WTG Mikey they are fun to catch but they are ugly congrats on your first ever carp
Well done Mike, congrats! -Brian
WTG Mike.
WTG MTBF! Now you gotta go get yourself and 20+lb carp!
Congrats on your first Mike!   Now you can understand why some of us like to catch the ugly things lol
Nice job. The picture looks like Scugog. If it is I guess some survived the die off last year.
ahh thats a baby  . Just messing with you man, nice looking fish. They are as scrapy as they come
Yup it was Lake Scugog.  Aside of this what would a approx weight be on this. my guess was between 5 and 10lbs. Not to sure.
Nice carp. That is an easy 6-7lb carp.  WTG!!!  Daniel www.ontariocarphunters.com
